mapper.select: select seq, title, image, discount, author, publisher from tblBook order by seq asc
mapper.insert: insert into tblBook (seq, title, link, description, image, author, discount, publisher, isbn, pubdate) values ((select max(seq) + 1 from tblBook), #{title}, #{link}, #{description}, #{image}, #{author}, #{discount}, #{publisher}, #{isbn}, #{pubdate})
